s.text: After he won the New Hampshire primary, Tsongas transcended his status as a media darling and got taken seriously as someone who could actually win the Democratic nomination.
At a press conference yesterday, Bradley said he has had four episodes since late December.
"The presidency is not an academic exercise," he declared this afternoon to the crowd of "family farm" folk in a barn in Perry, Iowa, using one of his favorite lines.

But within a few weeks, he was knocked out of the race by a combination of Bill Clinton's effective demagoguery on Social Security and concerns about his medical condition.
